Package com.example.home_page

Class chatWebSocketManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.home_page.chatWebSocketManager
public class chatWebSocketManager extends Object
Manages WebSocket connections for chat functionality. This singleton class handles connecting, sending messages, and disconnecting from a WebSocket server, and notifies a listener of connection events.
Author:
ayana
